title: Bare Land Near Pasikudah and Kalkudah Beaches for Sale
details:
Property details

Bare Land in Eastern Province, Batticaloa on Valaichchenai Kalkudah Main Road 100 meters to the Pasikudah and Kalkudah Beaches, Facing Valaichchenai Kalkudah Main Road for Sale. Extent 38 perches.
Excellent Location for Hotels, Beach Bungalows and Cabanas.
Could be used as a residential or Commercial Property.
Call/Text: (416) 986 6177 Canada
Price: Rs 150,000/= per perch
